name: Androga
description: A haven of science and reason…and a bunch of nerdy aliens who can’t fix their own machines.

name: Mars
description: There’s few more pleasant locations in the galaxy. They say it used to be a barren, red rock.

name: Earth
description: It’s not all that bad, except for the uninhabitable hot-zone around the equator. They say it used to be a nice place…

name: Titan
description: The floating cities are a sight to see! Just keep your tools secure and make sure not to drop anything.

name: Drema
description: Once humanity’s sworn enemy, Drema is now a very welcoming planet.
difficulty-description: Subtract 0.25x difficulty for improved mood from polite clients.

name: Technorion
description: The whole planet is one big machine! I guess that’s what happens when you give engineering an unlimited budget…

name: Gigantus
description: An abundance of oxygen on this planet means everything is really big…including the machines!
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for difficult-to-service giant machines.

name: Minituras
description: What is this, model making? Everything is so tiny!
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for difficult to service tiny machines.

name: Ark
description: Covered in violent, stormy seas, this planet was uninhabited until the discovery of valuable minerals buried within its crust. Resources spent, a hardy people still cling to life on the old mining platforms.
hazard-description: Roll 12 for slip-and-fall each day. If injured, spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for wet working conditions.

name: Jola
description: The oldest of the outer colonies, this small moon is a pleasant destination…as long as you’re not around for a hurricane.
hazard-description: Roll 30 for hurricanes each work day. If caught in a hurricane, relinquish all of your cards and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.

name: O'Fiver
description: A desert world of cattle ranchers and outlaws.
hazard-description: Roll 20 for bandits on each work day. If attacked, relinquish all of your cards.

name: Calvorus
description: Moving around in 3.7 Gs is a workout!

name: Arborius
description: Clean air, clear lakes, and…giant carnivorous birds?
hazard-description: Roll 12 for injury by giant swooping birds at the beginning of each day. If swooped, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Subtract 0.25x job difficulty for improved mood from natural beauty.

name: Automatus
description: Everyone’s a robot! Consider it a privilege you’re here. Mechanics are the only organic beings allowed on the planet!
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for pressure of not letting down robot overlords.

name: Slugora
description: It’s just so…slimy.
hazard-description: Roll 12 for slip-and-fall each day. If injured, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for slimy working conditions.

name: Verna
description: This planet’s inside out! Barren rock on the surface, abundant life within.

name: Silencia
description: As long as the floaty people don’t bother you, it’s a good gig. For what it’s worth, they’re very polite.
difficulty-description: Subtract 0.25x difficulty for improved mood from polite clients.

name: Sliponuras
description: Dark clouds and heavy rains perpetually afflict this planet.
hazard-description: Roll 12 for slip-and-fall each day. If injured, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for wet working conditions.

name: Asthamie
description: An undeniably creepy planet. It’s hot, foggy, and buggy. But what you really have to watch out for are the tree-vampires.
hazard-description: Roll 12 for injury by tree-vampire each day. If bitten, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.

name: Scorchiuras
description: Prepare to get toasty. It’s risky work, but the hazard pay is good!
hazard-description: Roll 6 for burn risk at the beginning of each day. If singed, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for inclement working conditions.

name: Freziuras
description: Don’t forget your winter coat and maybe pack the hot cocoa, too.
hazard-description: Roll 6 for freeze risk at the beginning of each day. If frozen, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for inclement working conditions.

name: Memoria
description: You might be tempted to bring your swimsuit, but don’t. There’s ghosts in the water!
hazard-description: Roll 12 for injury by sea-ghosts at the beginning of each day. If haunted, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for wet working conditions.

name: Alchemus
description: Everybody knows magic and machines don’t mix! You never know what you’re going to run into on this planet.
hazard-description: Roll 12 for injury by witches and other magical cryptids at the beginning of each day. If magicked, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for unsettled feeling from creepy magic.

name: Sanguina
description: The vampires are cause for concern, but even worse is how outdated their machines are!
hazard-description: Roll 12 for injury by vampires at the beginning of each day. If bitten, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for difficult-to-service junky old machines.

name: Doon
description: A sparsely populated planet covered in spicy sand. Watch out for those ground snakes!
hazard-description: Roll 12 for injury by ground snakes at the beginning of each day. If bitten, end your turn and spend the rest of the week in the hospital.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for spicy air.

name: Haulas
description: Without enough atmosphere to regulate temperature, the colonists on this planet live in giant rolling cities that eternally chase the sun.
difficulty-description: Add 0.25x job difficulty for dread of the ever looming shadow of certain death.
